softmax_boltzmann.note: Softmax over -delta_bits approximates Boltzmann over E if a transformer-like sampler underlies thermal stats.

interference.note: Decoherence should reduce fringe visibility if phase coherence is physical.

causality.note: Local-softmax attention enforces finite-speed influence per step (light-cone).

area_law.note: Sublinear S(block) growth is consistent with locality/low-rank mixing (area-law-like).

spectral_bias.note: 1/f^alpha with alpha near 1 indicates trained-generator style spectral bias.

ecc_projection.note: Projection onto a smooth-phase constraint manifold reduces a stabilizer-like syndrome.

rarity_vs_bits.note: Exponential rarity with cost supports a compression-driven generator.
